It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, clustered leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically green or white in color. Its growth habit is adapted to thrive in dry, rocky environments, making it a resilient species in arid conditions.
